battleTraits.name: Always Three Clawsteps Ahead
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase, Enemy Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: The best-laid plans of the Skaven never go awry (or so they claim).
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat.
battleTraits.effect: That unit can use the ‘Normal **Move**’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

battleTraits.name: Gnawhole Ambush
battleTraits.lore: A pack of Skaven emerges onto the battlefield from a glowing green rift in reality.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is **in the tunnels below** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit wholly within 6" of a corner of the battlefield and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: The Lurking Vermintide
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly unit that has not been deployed to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: The target unit is set up in reserve in the tunnels below. Units **in the tunnels below** that have not used the ‘Gnawhole Ambush’ ability by the end of the third battle round are destroyed.

battleTraits.name: Too Quick To Hit-hit
battleTraits.lore: These skittish ratmen dart and run in all directions, avoiding retribution as they flee from combat.
battleTraits.effect: No mortal damage is inflicted on friendly **SKAVEN **INFANTRY**** and ****CAVALRY**** units by ****RETREAT**** abilities.

battleTraits.name: The Lurking Vermintide
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **SKAVEN** unit that has not been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit in reserve **in the tunnels below**. It has now been deployed.

battleTraits.name: Always Three Clawsteps Ahead
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: The best laid plans of the Skaven never go awry (or so they claim).
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-****MONSTER** SKAVEN** unit that is not in combat and was not set up this turn to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: That unit can use the 'Normal **Move**' ability as if it were your movement phase.

battleTraits.name: Gnawhole Ambush
battleTraits.lore: Emerging from a green, glowing rift, the Skaventide pours onto the battlefield.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **SKAVEN** unit that is **in the** **tunnels below** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit wholly within 6" of a friendly **Gnawhole** and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Splinters of the Vermindoom
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.lore: In the aftermath of the Vermindoom, reality continues to fracture and tear as gnawholes bore into reality, spewing forth endless tides of ratmen.
battleTraits.declare: You can use this ability if there are fewer than 3 friendly **Gnawholes** on the battlefield.
battleTraits.effect: Set up a **Gnawhole** on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units, more than 1" from all friendly units and more than 3" from all objectives and other terrain features.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Warpstone Charm
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This foul talisman radiates mutating energy.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for enemy units in combat with your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Cloak of Stitched Victories
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This cloak is made from the stitched pelts of traitors and inflicts a rabid paranoia upon the bearer, making them hard to hit and even harder to stab in the back.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Skryre Connections
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This Clawlord has tasked the Skryre engineers under their command to overcharge their ratling pistol.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Your general’s **Ratling Pistol** has an Attacks characteristic of 2D6 instead of D6.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Lead the Seething Horde
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared the ‘Call for Reinforcements’ ability
spearheadEnhancements.lore: With screeched war cries, this Clawlord directs their vermin underlings to swarm the enemy.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Instead of using the set-up instructions in the ‘Call for **Reinforcements**’ ability, the replacement unit can be set up wholly within 13" of this unit and not in combat.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Cage of Warp Lightning
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: A ‘gift’ to the Grey Seer from the Clans Skryre, when this unstable device works correctly, it can momentarily trap its victims in a prison of thrashing galvanic tendrils.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 6" of your general and roll a dice.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 2+, the enemy unit has **STRIKE-LAST** this phase. On a 1, inflict 1 mortal damage on your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Scurry Away
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This Grey Seer is a staunch believer in the Skaven philosophy that prudent cowardice is a virtue, and they do not think twice about scampering to safety when things look to be going south.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the ‘**Retreat**’ ability as if it were your movement phase. If it does so, no mortal damage is inflicted on it.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Skilled Manipulator
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This Grey Seer is particularly devious and self-serving, deftly ensuring that their minions are always conveniently positioned between themselves and potential threats.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Your general has **WARD (4+)** while they are within 1" of any friendly **Clanrats** units.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Skitterleap
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The Grey Seer vanishes in a puff of foul-smelling smoke, reappearing elsewhere on the battlefield an eye-blink later.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 6+, remove your general from the battlefield and set them up again on the battlefield more than 6" from all enemy units. They cannot use ****MOVE**** abilities in the following movement phase.

heroicTraits.name: Scurry Away
heroicTraits.lore: This Skaven chief does not think twice about scampering to safety when things look to be going south. Perhaps that’s why they have lived so long.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the ‘**Retreat**’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

heroicTraits.name: Short-tempered
heroicTraits.lore: This twitching and irascible Skaven has succeeded in making their minions more afraid of their displeasure than of the enemy.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to **run** rolls and **charge** rolls for friendly **SKAVEN** units while they are wholly within 13" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Skilled Manipulator
heroicTraits.lore: This Skaven warlord is particularly devious and selfserving, deftly ensuring that their minions are always conveniently positioned between themselves and potential threats.
heroicTraits.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly non-****HERO** SKAVEN **INFANTRY**** unit:

• This unit has **WARD (4+)**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly non-****HERO** SKAVEN **INFANTRY**** unit within this unit’s combat range after the damage sequence for this unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

artefactsOfPower.name: Skavenbrew
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: This foul concoction, brewed from blood and warpstone, is dispensed to expendable underlings to drive them into a short-lived but devastating killing frenzy.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick a friendly non-****HERO** SKAVEN **INFANTRY**** unit wholly within 13" of this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

artefactsOfPower.name: Foulhide
artefactsOfPower.lore: Fashioned from the flensed flesh of Rat Ogors and soaked in cloying alchemical agents, this stinking armour sticks to its wearer like a bloated second skin and regrows as fast as it can be hacked apart.

artefactsOfPower.name: Warpstone Charm
artefactsOfPower.lore: This foul talisman radiates mutating energy that can be directed at an enemy unit to erode their armour.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

regimentAbilities.name: Endless Swarm of Rats
regimentAbilities.lore: From the many gnawholes that encircle the battlefield, more and more verminkin swarm forth without cease.
regimentAbilities.effect: When a friendly **Clanrats** unit uses its ‘Seething Swarm’ ability, you can return D6 slain models to that unit instead of D3.

regimentAbilities.name: Warpstone-laced Armour
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: Opponent declared an ATTACK ability and targeted your Stormfiends unit
regimentAbilities.lore: Lurid green lightning begins to crackle across the armour of the Stormfiends, momentarily deflecting any blows levelled at them.

regimentAbilities.name: Warpstone-laced Bullets
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Shooting Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: Saturated with the energies of ruin, these munitions pack a deadly punch.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a ranged weapon a friendly unit is armed with.

regimentAbilities.name: Too Quick To Hit-hit
regimentAbilities.lore: These skittish ratmen dart and run in all directions, avoiding retribution as they flee from combat.
regimentAbilities.effect: No mortal damage is inflicted on friendly units when they use ****RETREAT**** abilities.

abilities.name: Warpgale
abilities.lore: Screeching in an unholy tongue, the caster parts the veil of reality and draws a ravening gale of unnatural energies forth.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SKAVEN WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Wither
abilities.lore: The spellcaster hurls a glowing green globe of magical energy at the foe. Anyone touched by the globe starts to shrivel and wither away.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SKAVEN WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 13" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Skitterleap
abilities.lore: Vanishing in a puff of foul-smelling smoke, the verminkin reappear elsewhere on the battlefield an eye-blink later.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SKAVEN WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **SKAVEN HERO** wholly within 13" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Rabid-tough
abilities.lore: The priest snarls and conjures a dense cloud of toxins that sends their followers into a frenzy that numbs them to pain.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SKAVEN PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **SKAVEN INFANTRY** unit wholly within 13" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that unit until the start of your next turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, add 1 to save rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Bile-torrent
abilities.lore: The priest screeches with glowing green eyes as a torrent of bile sweeps over their foe.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SKAVEN PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 13" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If the chanting roll was 8+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each 4+ instead.

abilities.name: Filth-crust
abilities.lore: The Great Horned Rat heeds the call of this priest to encrust the weapons of their minions with irresistible contagions.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SKAVEN PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **SKAVEN INFANTRY** unit wholly within 13" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks until the start of your next turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, the target’s melee weapons have **Crit (Mortal)** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Summon Vermintide
abilities.lore: A Skaven spellcaster can summon forth a seething mass of arcane rodents that consumes everything in its path.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Vermintide** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SKAVEN WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Vermintide** wholly within 13" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Bell of Doom
abilities.lore: Invoking ancient creation myths, the spellcaster causes a great Bell of Doom to manifest upon the battlefield.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Bell of Doom** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SKAVEN WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Bell of Doom** wholly within 13" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Warp Lightning Vortex
abilities.lore: Warpstone shards are cast into the air, growing impossibly large and discharging bolts of warp lightning.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Warp Lightning Vortex** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SKAVEN WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up the first part of the **Warp Lightning Vortex** within 18" of the caster and visible to them, then set up the second and third parts exactly 7" from the first part and exactly 7" from each other so that they form a triangle.

abilities.name: Corrupted Earth
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: The Clans Pestilens are relentless in advancing the spread of plague and corruption.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **PESTILENS** units that are in combat to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
For each target:

• Make a pile-in move.
• Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Claw-picked
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The Stormvermin and Clanrats of a Verminus Claw‑horde are amongst the most ferocious of all ratmen.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **VERMINUS** units that charged this turn to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Skryre Prototypes
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.lore: The fell contraptions wielded by these ratmen were created by the Clans Skryre’s most ingenious weaponsmiths.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **SKRYRE** units to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice for each target and apply the corresponding effect:

**1 -** ***Kaboom!***
Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

**2-5 - *More Power!***
Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

**6 - *More-more Power!***
In addition to the effect of ‘More Power!’, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s ranged weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Prized Creations
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Moulder warbeasts are studded with warpstone crystals and pumped full of vile serums that spur their battle-rage – at the occasional cost of overtaxing their forms.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly non-**HERO MOULDER** units to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice for each target and apply the corresponding effect:

**1-2 - *Self-destructive Fury***
Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

**3-4 - *Rabid Infusion***
Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

**5-6 -** ***Blinded by Frenzy***
In addition to the effect of ‘Rabid Infusion’, the target has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.
